text: Massimo D'Alema (; born 20 April 1949) is an Italian politician. He was the 53rd Prime Minister of Italy from 1998 to 2000. Later he was Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2006 to 2008. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Rome
title: Massimo D'Alema
